attributes.action: Reveal The Truth About Extraterrestrial Visitation To Our Planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am writing to request your support on the matter of full disclosure concerning U.F.O.s and Extraterrestrial visitation to our planet. This subject has been classified to such an extent that it has been taken out of the hands of governmental control and possibly the purview of the prime minister himself. This is not acceptable, and this matter must be properly investigated and de-classified for the benefit of all mankind. I am an active supporter of the Alien Disclosure Group, and therefore committed to the cause of full disclosure. We are requesting a full and thorough investigation into ways we can de-classify, and disclose this information.

Our Objectives

1: Prove Extraterrestrials visit earth on a frequent basis and are here to help mankind.

2: Request the British and American Government to reveal all the facts concerning Extraterrestrial visitation to our planet.

3: Stop the deliberate targeting of Extraterrestrial craft with space based weapon systems.
